title: Bug 49299 - Inconsistent Cookie Name in Servlet 3.0 URL Rewriting
description: The bug report highlights an inconsistency in Servlet 3.0's behavior regarding custom cookie names and URL rewriting.
OB: The observed behavior is that, in contrast to the Servlet 3.0 specification, the Reload link on the page uses 'jsessionid' instead of the custom session tracking cookie name in the URL.
EB: The expected behavior, as per Servlet 3.0 specification (7.1.1), is that the Reload link should use the custom session tracking cookie name in the URL.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Deploy the provided 'cookiename.war' file.
2. Access 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/'.
